item.description:
On April 16, 2012, New York Times bestselling author Susan Jacoby, currently program director of The Center for Inquiry, and Dinesh D’Souza recent author of “What’s so Great About Christianity?” and president of the King’s College, debated "Is Christianity Good for America Politics?" at the Hauenstein Center for Presidential Studies at Grand Valley State University in Grand Rapids, Michigan. Join us on Saturday, August 4, at 2:30 p.m. at 700 Hartford Turnpike in Hamden, when we will watch and discuss portion of this debate.

Refreshments will be served.
item.how_to_find_us: We will probably be upstairs in the library, or in the social hall.
item.name: Conversations: Is Christianity Good for American Politics?
